page.title: 20A DAY IN A LIFE.
page.content: On Saturday the milkman picks me up. We do our street first,then into Othello Close.I take two fresh and two stery to the first house on the left,then two fresh next door.It is very hard to carry the bottles.Two more fresh to the third house and then back to the float and up the close I go.On to another street,only the rest of the round to do.Then home for dinner and out to play.{(Ray Kelly)} I get up at 7.30 a.m.,wash,dress then eat breakfast.School for 9.00a.m.. Assembly then maths,playtime 10.45a.m. to 11.00a.m.(I play football).After play we have Ginn time.During dinner I play football.In the afternoon it is religion or topic or games or art. School ends at 3.15p.m.,I have my tea then either play with my friends in the street or watch t.v..Bedtime is always at 9.00p.m.{(Thomas Cubbin)}
